Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.persistence

Classes that represent the data saved and restored when saving the game.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    PlayerLeaderCards
    Contains an instance of all the leader cards and their corresponding player
    PlayerSlot
    Holds an instance of all players' nickname and their respective board slots
    PlayersOrder
    This class servers the purpose of storing in a file the order of the players in the game and the current player, so that when a saved game is loaded the game can restart from the correct point
    SavedDevMarket
    Holds all the relevant data of the development market, without unnecessary nesting
    SavedResourceMarket
    Holds all the relevant data of the resource market, without unnecessary nesting
    SavedState
    Contains the main logic of the persistence feature and it's the class that should be accessed to save and load games
